Keywords: Codex , Detective , Monster , Weapon X , X-Force , X-Men
Real Name: Laura Kinney
Special Powers
SYMBIOTIC FUSION: Plasticity, Super Senses. // If Venom Wolverine is within 4 squares and line of fire of an opposing character, she can't be targeted by range attacks.
MERGED WITH THE SYMBIOTE: Giant Reach: 2. // FREE: If Venom Wolverine has two action tokens, make a close attack.
THE MORE THINGS CHANGE...: Blades/Claws/Fangs. When Venom Wolverine uses it, after resolutions heal her equal to half the d6 result.
...THE MORE THEY STAY THE SAME: STOP. Toughness, Regeneration.

Comments
February 25, 2022
SuperClixer
Wizkids said we were supposed to get larger size figures, starting with the House of X Set. This is no larger scale than the prior made figures that were made before House of X.
October 27, 2021
Goop
With two tokens she can attack again so she has a bit of a flurry thing going as well as a super steal energy thing on those later clicks. The symbiotic fusion the venoms got this set works very well with her combat reflexes too. The stop click is nice being able to heal with blades past STOP over and over again. Very strong for 75pts.
